data: The summer’s sun was just struggling through the mists that overhung the eastern horizon, and faintly gilding the towers and housetops of Zarahemla, as a party of seven horsemen, evidently weary with the night’s travel, were seen slowly moving along the foot of the hill Manti, in the direction of the above named city.
